name: OH ROBOTS!
description:
(Recomended fullscreen)

You are a human being atack by robots.

Defend yourself by defeating them.

More Instruction in-game

[The "credits" button (in-game), only work when start the game, if you play and then go back to the menu, it won't work. Also in the "credits" menu, there are two "music" sections, the botton one should be SFX (sorry about that) :c]

[The game music doen't loop (even though I checked the loop checkbox or at least I think so) sorry againg...)
